hero.title: CRAFTED SAFARIS, JUST FOR YOU
hero.description: SEAMLESS SAFARIS TAILORED TO MATCH YOUR DESTINATIONS.

packages.title: Safari & Beach Packages
packages.subtitle: Choose your adventure: classic safaris, family escapes, coastal relaxation and more.

about.title: Your Safari, Made Simple
about.bestGuidesDesc: Local experts who know every hidden gem and make your adventure unforgettable.
about.satisfactionDesc: We go above and beyond to ensure every guest leaves with a smile and lifelong memories.
about.uniqueDestinationsDesc: Discover one-of-a-kind safari locations and hidden gems you won't find anywhere else.
about.bestPriceDesc: Get the best value for your safari adventure with our competitive pricing and quality service.
about.flexibleDesc: Travel on your terms with flexible dates and customizable itineraries that fit your schedule.
about.sustainabilityDesc: We're committed to responsible tourism that protects wildlife and supports local communities.
about.ourStoryDesc1: From humble beginnings to leading safaris across Africa, our team is passionate about crafting journeys that celebrate wildlife, culture, and the spirit of adventure. Our mission: to make every safari personal, safe, and extraordinary for every guest.
about.ourStoryDesc2: Whether you're traveling solo, as a family, or with friends, our tailored itineraries and local expertise guarantee an experience you'll never forget.

contact.title: ‚ô°Book Your Safari Experience‚ô°
contact.description: Let us know where you'd love to tour in Kenya, your budget, travel dates, number of travelers, preferred activities, or any special requests. The more details you provide, the better we can customize your safari experience!
contact.messagePlaceholder: Where in Kenya would you like to tour? What's your budget, preferred dates, number of travelers, special interests, etc.?
contact.successMessage: Our team is reviewing your message and will reach out in 10-30 minutes!

contactHours.title: 24/7 Customer Service
contactHours.description: Our team is available 24/7 to answer any queries. Contact us through the options below. Typical response time: 10‚Äì30 minutes.

comingSoon.subtitle: Powered by innovation, inspired by Africa.

footer.description: Your premier destination for authentic African safari experiences. Creating memories that last a lifetime.

mara-tsavo.title: Mara & Tsavo Wildlife Safari
mara-tsavo.description: Experience the iconic Big 5 across two legendary parks. Witness lions, elephants, and cheetahs in their natural habitat, with expert-guided game drives and evening sundowners.
mara-tsavo.overview: Explore two iconic parks in one trip ‚Äî from the rolling plains of Maasai Mara to the rugged landscapes of Tsavo. This safari is rich in Big 5 wildlife and offers dramatic scenic contrasts.
customizable: Upgrade to luxury camp or tented lodge
Domestic flight instead of road transfers
Change order or length of activities
notes: This is a suggested list of activities ‚Äî you are free to pick only what you like.
You can shorten or extend the trip or swap in other parks or destinations.
Hot air balloon rides are subject to availability and weather.

amboseli-chyulu.title: Amboseli & Chyulu Explorer
amboseli-chyulu.description: Marvel at Amboseli's majestic elephants against Mount Kilimanjaro's backdrop and explore the hidden trails of Chyulu Hills for a serene wildlife adventure.
amboseli-chyulu.overview: Witness majestic elephants set against Mount Kilimanjaro, then explore the mysterious lava landscapes of Chyulu Hills on trails and scenic drives.
activities: Guided walks in Chyulu lava trails
Hiking or biking on Chyulu terrain
customizable: Replace road with light aircraft segments
Extend stay in Chyulu or nearby
notes: Flexible trip: you can allocate more time to Chyulu or Amboseli as you prefer.
Some walking trails may be weather dependent.

family-safari-beach.title: Family Safari & Beach Holiday
family-safari-beach.description: A perfect family mix of safari excitement and beach relaxation. Enjoy safe guided game drives, sandcastle building on Diani Beach, and fun-filled coastal activities for all ages.
family-safari-beach.overview: Mix wildlife adventure with coastal relaxation ‚Äî perfect for families wanting the thrill of safaris and the calm of the beach in one getaway.
included: Transfers between safari and beach zones
notes: You choose how many nights to spend at sea vs safari.
Activities are flexible ‚Äî skip or replace any you don't like.

romantic-safari.title: Romantic Safari & Honeymoon Escape
romantic-safari.description: Indulge in a couple's dream getaway with private safari lodges, candlelit dinners under the stars, and tranquil beachside sunsets for an unforgettable romantic experience.
romantic-safari.overview: Designed for couples seeking privacy, romance, and wildlife ‚Äî enjoy secluded lodges, candlelit dinners under the stars, and intimate safari moments.
customizable: Customize pace according to you both
notes: Your honeymoon or romantic trip, your way ‚Äî pick only what you love.
Some extras (spa, private dinners) may incur additional fees.

coastal-adventure.title: Kenyan Coastal Adventure
coastal-adventure.description: Discover Kenya's stunning coastline with sun-soaked beaches, snorkeling adventures, and cultural explorations from Watamu to Diani. A perfect blend of adventure and relaxation.
coastal-adventure.overview: Immerse in Kenya's coastline ‚Äî vibrant cultures, marine life, pristine beaches and water adventures await you from Watamu to Diani.
customizable: Choose your coastal accommodation (villa, resort, budget)
notes: This is your customizable coastal escape ‚Äî choose the beach life you want.
Some water sports may depend on tides & weather.

wildebeest-migration.title: Wildebeest Migration Spectacle
wildebeest-migration.description: Witness one of the greatest natural wonders ‚Äî the Great Wildebeest Migration through Maasai Mara. Perfect for nature lovers seeking unmatched drama.
wildebeest-migration.overview: Witness one of the greatest natural wonders ‚Äî the Great Wildebeest Migration through Maasai Mara. Perfect for nature lovers seeking unmatched drama.
activities: Hot air balloon ride over migration paths
notes: Timings of river-crossings are nature dependent‚Äîflexibility advised.

coast-offer.title: Kenyan Coast Explorer (Offer)
coast-offer.description: Explore Kenya's coastal gems from Malindi, Watamu to Diani ‚Äî beaches, marine life, culture, and relaxation all in one journey.
coast-offer.overview: Explore Kenya's coastal gems from Malindi, Watamu to Diani ‚Äî beaches, marine life, culture, and relaxation all in one journey.
activities: Day trip to Wasini or Kisite reefs
notes: Great offer combining multiple coastal towns in one adventure.
Ideal for travelers wanting sea + culture.
